plot: This film explains how sneezing in public can spread disease, and shows how using a handkerchief can stop it.
title: Coughs and Sneezes
plot_es: This film explains how sneezing in public can spread disease, and shows how using a handkerchief can stop it.
plot_en: This film explains how sneezing in public can spread disease, and shows how using a handkerchief can stop it.
